document_data.name: ''Adventurer's Guide''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Adventurer's Guide''''' was a multi-author [[book]] that shared its many insights on the trade of adventuring with the readers.
document_data.Description: The ''Adventurer's Guide'' was an old tome that showed its age through wear and tear. The book had mismatched dogeared and dirt-stained pages. Most of the book was hand-written by many contributors over the years, evident by a variety of penmanship inside.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, the ''Adventurer's Guide'' traveled aboard the ''[[Vigilant (ship)|Vigilant]]'' from the [[Sword Coast North]] to the nation of [[Samarach]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]], alongside the infamous [[bard]] and author â€“ [[Volothamp Geddarm]].
